divs: Sighting DetailsI had heard some strange sounds outside my Grandmas house, and had gone out with my dad. When we saw these lights move across the sky very nice and calm. Yellow and red. And was blinking slowly. My dad says their drones. But 5 of them and no nosie that close to the ground. I dont think so. It was lost some where over the tress and tall houses.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Cheviot
There were no other sightings in Cheviot on or around March 31st 2013
Summary: 5 lights moved across the sky. They came one after another/ Didnt think they were lanterns. They were way to bright.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
